snippet: Young tennis players need to be educated about the implications of match-fixing and the sport needs to be more proactive in talking about the issue, world number two Andy Murray said on Tuesday....
lead_paragraph: Young tennis players need to be educated about the implications of match-fixing and the sport needs to be more proactive in talking about the issue, world number two Andy Murray said on Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: Education Key to Preventing Match-Fixing Says Murray
headline.main: Education Key to Preventing Match-Fixing Says Murray
